name: Chocolate Raspberry Protein Milkshake
description: Who says a shake can’t be good for you? Add extra chocolaty goodness with a scoop of Power Up Chocolate Protein Blend. You’ll also be adding 20 g of plant-based protein that’s packed with digestive enzymes for a happy belly!
preparation: Measure ice cream, yogurt, milk, raspberries, and protein blend into a blender.
Blend on high until well incorporated, about 45 sec.
tips: Blend splashes of milk into the shake until you reach your desired consistency.
For an Epic Life friendly dessert, make mini shakes. One shake will serve two Epic friends!
To chill glasses, rinse with cold water and freeze for 10 minutes.

products.name: Power Up Chocolate Protein Blend (Pouch)
summary: We like to fuel our bodies and satisfy those chocolate cravings at the same time. Made with pea and fava bean protein, this blend turns into a velvety shake (just mix with water or milk) or morning smoothie with a luscious creamy texture, not chalky like a lot of other protein powders. It’s made with heat-stable probiotics which means baking with benefits! Add to pancake, waffle, muffin, or cookie batters. Power up your morning with an extra boost from 20 g of plant-based protein and essential amino acids.
